subject: Issue with Gear effect on AMS2
description_text:
Dear Simsonn support team,

I'm using successfully Plus X pedals with Haptics Pro motors. Super happy with my purchase, everything works fine !!

I contact you as I noticed a strange issue with Gearshift effect in Automobilista 2. Haptic effect happens with huge lag (at least 1 second after gearshift), and does not apply the configured effect. Setup frequency, strength and duration seems ignored.I tried on both pedals, same issue.
There is no issue on ACC. All effects works as intended, included Gearsift.

Regards
Mathieu.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mathieu Ferracin,  We will review the code for Automobilista 2 today to see how we can fix the compatibility issue. In the meantime, you can download SimHub version 9.9.3, which fully supports SIMSONN devices and provides telemetry support for over 100 racing games. We recommend using it as your primary solution.Â
